original: “Yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, rāgo appahīno, doso appahīno, moho appahīno—
analyzed: ▁yassa ▁kassaci ▁bhikkhave ▁rāg o ▁appahīn o ▁dos o ▁appahīn o ▁moh o ▁appahīn o

original: ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘baddho mārassa paṭimukkassa mārapāso yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimato’.
analyzed: ▁ayaṃ ▁vuccati ▁bhikkhave ▁ baddh o ▁mār assa ▁paṭi mu kk assa ▁mār apā so ▁yathā kām a karaṇīy o ▁pāp i m ato

original: Yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, rāgo pahīno, doso pahīno, moho pahīno—
analyzed: ▁yassa ▁kassaci ▁bhikkhave ▁rāg o ▁pahīn o ▁dos o ▁pahīn o ▁moh o ▁pahīn o

original: ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘abaddho mārassa omukkassa mārapāso na yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimato’”ti.
analyzed: ▁ayaṃ ▁vuccati ▁bhikkhave ▁a baddh o ▁mār assa ▁ o mu kk assa ▁mār apā so ▁na ▁yathā kām a karaṇīy o ▁pāp i mat oti
▁buddh aṃ ▁ver a bhay ā tīt aṃ
▁ ā hu ▁sabb appa hā yi nanti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
